articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Amazon revamps Fire TV, launches its own ‘Artline’ televisions with frames at CES - TechCrunch
articles.description: Fire TV's new interface focuses on your content and offers easier, speedier navigation, Amazon says.
articles.content: Amazon is rolling out a Fire TV redesign that puts more focus on the content, while also simplifying the navigation and layout. The update represents the first major Fire TV release in years from a u… [+6194 chars]
